title: Hawkie's Story Of You - Hong Leong Bank's Can You Hack It 2022
description: Built Hawkie: Story Of You which transform your bank statement into a series of story and prompts, supplemented with AI art generation for HLB's Can You Hack It 2022
body:
> * Trying to the solve the problem of bank statements being boring and not engaging...but it is an untapped gold mine for personalization
> * Solution? Transform your bank statement into a series of story and prompts, supplemented with AI art generation
> * And this hackathon has a metaverse theme to it. What better way to experience your personal anthology than in the immersive metaverse?
> * The AI art is actually real, generated with the prompt feed into Stable Diffusion on NightCafe. See one here: https://creator.nightcafe.studio/creation/k1fNZRyasmVLHyDrACxP
> * Won the first prize and I was awarded the Best Demo Presenter Award
